nycTheatreExcerpt: They have the perfect director, the right supporting cast (Ricamora is both funny in his own right and fully cognizant of whose name is on the marquee) and, crucially, enough crazy political chaos going on outside the theater's doors that the wackier this show gets, it never feels too much removed from reality.
